1.「お題を見るから 挑戦するお題を選べば| ミーが仲間を見つけて 魔法の迷宮に送る: I'll show you a list of themes, and you choose|the one you wanna try! I'll find party members|for you and send you to the Maze!|<break>

3.「お題達成の初回報酬と 初回経験値は| お供え物を ささげた場合のみだモン！|: You'll only get a first time clear reward if|you make an offering! Themes will be updated|the 1st and 15th of each month!|<break>

4.「『お題に挑戦』は 迷宮内でお供え物を| ささげるモン！ 達成で初回の報酬と経験: Your challenge is to make an offering in|the Maze! You'll receive a first time reward|for each, as well as 4 red chests at the end!|<break>

5.「このお題は 既に達成しているモン。| ただ『お題に挑戦』で 迷宮の主を倒すと|: You've already completed this challenge.|However, if you beat it again, you'll get a|guaranteed 4 red chest reward at the end!|<break>

7.「ユーは お題になっている『お供え物』| つまりコインも カードも 召喚符も メ:
You don't have any coins, cards, summons, or|medals to offer.|
|If you find any, bring them to me.|

8.「聞きたい説明を 選ぶモン！|<break>: Choose the explanation you wanna hear!|<break>

9.<select_se_off>|お題の初回報酬と初回経験値|お題の迷宮の主に負け: <select_se_off>|First Time Clear Rewards|Failing a Theme|Rules for Helping|<select_end><break>

10.「ミーは あまり使わなくなった| コインやカードを 持っている人の| 味方なんだ:
I'm an ally of people who have coins and|cards they don't use much anymore. Coins,|cards, summons, medals, etc. are all|
|collectively called "offerings"! On the first|and fifteenth of every month, Me will issue a|new challenge to defeat the Lord of the|
|Labyrinth! If you defeat the master of your|chosen labyrinth with the offerings you've|received, you'll receive two special|
|benefits! The first is that when you defeat|the master of the labyrinth, four red|treasure chests will always appear! You can|
|do this as many times as you want, as long as|you hold it up and kill it! The second is|that for each challenge you complete, you'll|
|receive a nice first reward and first|experience from me!

11.「もし お題の迷宮の主に 負けてしまっても| ささげた お供え物は 戻ってくるモ:
Even if you lose to the master of the|labyrinth, the offerings you gave will be|returned! So I want you to keep giving|
|offerings and challenging the master of the|labyrinth!

12.「パーティの仲間の お手伝いの時は| リーダーに 誘ってもらって| 魔法の迷宮へ:
When you're helping out a party, ask the|leader to take you to a magical labyrinth. If|you're helping someone else on your own, you|
|can choose "Helping" from the "Me" menu. In|that case, your level has to be at least|<%nW_MAX_LV> to go to the labyrinth! If you|
|meet the requirements and find the right|person, we'll send you to the labyrinth|together. I'm sure you've heard of it, but|
|I'm not sure if you've heard of it. If you|have an offering, I recommend you give it to|the Lord of the Labyrinth, because it's a lot|
|cheaper than "going with help". Also, if you|want to quit in the middle of the game, just|like in the magic labyrinth, you can use the|
|magic key to leave the party and come back to|this world... But if you've left the party,|it'll take 10 minutes before you can go to|
|the next magical labyrinth, so I don't|recommend it...

14.「お手伝いで行くなら| 今のパーティから抜ける必要が あるモン！: If you to help others, you need to leave your|current party!

15.「お供え物は 迷宮内でささげるモン！ | それじゃあ 他に手伝ってくれる人を|: You'll make an offering inside the Maze! Now|then, let me find some party members for|you!♪

16.「お供え物は 迷宮内でささげるモン！ | それじゃあ ユーの 今の仲間を| 魔法: You can make your offering once inside of|the Maze! Now then, I'll search for some|allies to join your current party!

17.「あれれ？ レベルが 足りないみたいだモン。 | 誰かの迷宮の主を お手伝いした:
What is it? I don't think I have enough|levels... If you want to help the master of|someone else's labyrinth, you need to be at|
|least level <%nW_MAX_LV>.

18.「オーノー！ お題をド忘れしてしまったモン。| ソーリー ちょっと 思いだすから: Ohhh noooo! I forgot what the theme was.|Sorry... I'll think of something else. Come|back in a while.
